title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Utilizing Gamification

context.additional_context: Conducting language learning activities incorporating game elements in a smartphone-centric restricted technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can acquire and utilize over 15 new language expressions per week through game-based activities.
Learners can maintain a voluntary learning participation rate of over 80% in gamification environments.
Learners can improve communication skills with peer learners by 30% through collaborative game-based tasks.
Learners can demonstrate the ability to use context-appropriate language through story-based quest completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
